proto

proto contain notes and code used to learn about different aspects of robotics.

Build

For convenience there is a Makefile that automates the installation of dependencies and building of proto. To install dependencies, build and test proto simply issue the following commands:

make third_party
make install
make tests

alternatively just type make help to bring up other make targets.
